Articles.Content: This is an idea that when you transmit you must have a delay and will add sounds with transmissions. Quite Like The Remotetech Mod. But you would have the option to turn this on/off

The point would be questionable, since we don't really "see" the recieving end of the transmission. To the gameplay it would have negligible effect if the send took an unrealistic "instantaneous" or 15 minutes.
